pages.text: Wraiths are new aggresive creatures that can be found in the Soul Sand Valley.$(br2)They attack like a common Zombie, inflict slowness and jump back upon dealing damage.$(br2)On death, they will drop a Soul Bead.$(br2)You can use Soul Bead right clicking them, It will point to the nearest Nether Fortress.
They're the lost souls of different creatures, and as such, their sounds are low pitch versions of normal mob sounds.
